sim module¶

  1. Aalto Electric Drives (contact: marko.hinkkanen@aalto.fi)

motulator: Open-Source Simulator for Motor Drives and Power Converters

sim.sensored_ctrl()¶

Run the digital controller and solve the continuous-time system model.

sim.sensorless_ctrl()¶

Run the digital controller and solve the continuous-time system model.
